title: Stuck at 'Authenticating' when logging in
body:
Whenever I try to log in the client gets stuck at 'authenticating' and then tells me an unknown error occurred. This has been happening on and off for a few days now and it seems im finally stuck and haven't been able to log in for the past 36 hours. I know riot saw a spike in these errors about a week ago that seemed related to the east coast and eventually was declared resolved but now its happening to me! I have attempted following the support page on a number of possible fixes, including the hextech repair tool, but nothing seems to work!
please help
thanks

replies.body:
We're currently doing a [**bit of maintenance**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/FcZeEbwc-109-players-unable-to-login) to try and finally squash this issue. This might be related to some network settings though, so let's be sure to test those juuuuust to cover all of our bases. 

Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on **Port Forwarding and DNS**. If that doesn't seem to help, feel free to hit me back up!
